TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTitle extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类以编程方式指定 Web 窗``体页的 HTML 元素。 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5d4f-102">Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> class to programmatically specify the HTML `<title>` element of a Web Forms page.</span></span> > [!NOTE] > <span data-ttu-id="e5d4f-103">还可以`title`通过使用[@ page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指令的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Title%2A>或通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>类的属性来设置页面标题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5d4f-103">You can also set the page title by using the `title` attribute of the [@ Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive, or by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Title%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.</span></span> ## Examples <span data-ttu-id="e5d4f-104">下面的代码示例演示如何在网页的标题栏中显示当前日期和时间。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5d4f-104">The following code example demonstrates how to display the current date and time in the title bar of the Web page.</span></span> [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/CS/htmltitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/VB/htmltitlevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化使用默认值的控件的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control using default values. 它在网页上``创建一个 HTML 元素。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5d4f-107">It creates an HTML `<title>` element on the Web page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e5d4f-108">下表显示了<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>类的实例的初始属性值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5d4f-108">The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> class.</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="e5d4f-109">Property</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5d4f-109">Property</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="e5d4f-110">初始值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5d4f-110">Initial Value</span></span>| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|<span data-ttu-id="e5d4f-111">"Title" 文本字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5d4f-111">The "title" literal string.</span></span>| ## Examples <span data-ttu-id="e5d4f-112">下面的代码示例演示如何在网页的标题栏中显示当前日期和时间。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5d4f-112">The following code example demonstrates how to display the current date and time in the title bar of the Web page.</span></span> [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/CS/htmltitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/VB/htmltitlevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 通知 控件已分析了一个 XML 或 HTML 元素，并将该元素添加到该控件的 集合中。

span.span: Notifies the control that an XML or HTML element was parsed and adds that element to the collection of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果添加到控件的元素 是控件, 则该方法会使用文本字符串的值设置属性; 否则, 将调用基方法。If the element added to the control is a control, then the method sets the property with the value of the literal string; otherwise, the base method is called. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能。 The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置 HTML 元素的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the HTML element.
The text of the HTML element.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定网页的标题。Use the property to specify or determine the title of the Web page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件的属性来动态更改网页的标题。The following code example demonstrates using the property of an control to dynamically change the title of a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/CS/htmltitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/VB/htmltitlevb.aspx#1)]
